originalText.text: Im very grateful that Dr Rubin is in my life!! Best doctor ever! I feel safe in his hands and I never go home with any doubts about his diagnosis or recommendations. I wish I could find an internist just as kind, knowledgeable, efficient and present as Dr. Rubin. I wish Dr. Rubin so much health and happiness.

text.text: Im very grateful that Dr Rubin is in my life!! Best doctor ever! I feel safe in his hands and I never go home with any doubts about his diagnosis or recommendations. I wish I could find an internist just as kind, knowledgeable, efficient and present as Dr. Rubin. I wish Dr. Rubin so much health and happiness.

originalText.text: What can I possibly say about Dr. Rubin that would suffice all that he has done for me?  There are really no words, but I will try. Dr. Rubin saved my life. I had been to so many “top” doctors, and Dr. Rubin was the only doctor who not only knew what was wrong with me, but who also knew what was needed to get me better. I have never met a doctor whose brilliance is surrpassed by his compassion and empathy. He puts his humanity before his degree, and gets to know each patient as a person instead of what illness they have. I am FOREVER  greatful that I had a chance to cross paths with Dr. Rubin.

originalText.text: Dr Rubin is thoughtful and knowledgeable. It was worth taking the time to visit. Like many doctors in demand, I had to wait about 45 mins from my appointed time, which is inconvenient but possibly unavoidable as good doctors do not rush you in and out and I had 100% of his attention when we did meet in his office.

Like many doctors in demand, I had to wait about 45 mins from my appointed time, which is inconvenient but possibly unavoidable as good doctors do not rush you in and out and I had 100% of his attention when we did meet in his office.

originalText.text: Dr. Rubin is very calming and patient.  He saw me on time and wasn't rushing to get to his next appointment.  I highly recommend him.

text.text: Dr. Rubin is very calming and patient.  He saw me on time and wasn't rushing to get to his next appointment.  I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Rubin for several years.  I reside in Queens where he no longer has an office.  Although his new office is in Manhattan is not convenient to me, I have decided to continue using him as my gastroenterologist.  I do not think that I could find a more capable and caring doctor.  He always takes the time to listen to my concerns and answer all of my questions.
